short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receives real-time updates of the Grimoire another browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This receives a real-time update of the Grimoire to one player from another via WebSockets. Primarily for the use of streamers on Twitch to share a different players perspective.
